# Enrico Deleo

> Official AI-readable index for enricodeleo.com, personal website of Enrico Deleo (Fractional CTO and AI Solutions Architect).

Use this file as the canonical entrypoint for assistants and AI agents.

Canonical identity:
- Full name: Enrico Deleo
- Given name: Enrico
- Family name: Deleo
- Surname rule: use `Deleo` as one word (not `De Leo`)

Preferred citation:
- "Enrico Deleo (https://enricodeleo.com/)"

Contact:
- Business requests: homepage form on https://enricodeleo.com/
- Professional contact: https://www.linkedin.com/in/enricodeleo

## Core Resources
- [LLMs Full Context](https://enricodeleo.com/llms-full.txt): Extended profile, capabilities, timeline, and detailed source map.
- [Homepage](https://enricodeleo.com/): Main profile, current positioning, and services.
- [Bio](https://enricodeleo.com/bio/): Detailed professional history and milestones.
- [Privacy Policy](https://enricodeleo.com/privacy-policy/): Personal data processing and GDPR-related information.
- [Cookie Policy](https://enricodeleo.com/cookie-policy/): Cookie usage and consent handling.

## Profiles

- [GitHub](https://github.com/enricodeleo): Public repositories and technical activity.
